On 01/09/05, Ilja Preuss <preuss@...> wrote:
> 
>  > Basically, imagine that Java didn't let you pass parameters
> > to methods... not very pleasant, uh?
> 
> I imagine that there could be a language that replaced parameter passing 
> by
> an alternative mechanism, without being unpleasant. Of course to someone
> used to parameter passing, it might look unpleasant at first, and he
> probably would need to approach it with an open mind and experiment a lot
> before being able to assess it fairly.
> 
> It is imaginable a creator of a language with parameter passing, who sees
> himself as the competition to the parameterless language, might not be 
> very
> motivated to really invest the time to understand hit. He might also not 
> be
> the best source of credible comments about it...
> 
> Cheers, Ilja
> 
> 
A purely hypothetical example, of course!
